attributes.action: Reverse mandatory vaccination for NHS workers and care workers
attributes.additional_details:
I have been vaccinated and had the booster but I don’t believe in forcing anyone to have any vaccination.
The nhs staff we’re talking about are dedicated, hard working and passionate human beings. They have been under paid and under valued for the last 11 years and actually insulted by being offered a meagre 1% pay rise. They continue to work long hours out of commitment to those in their care. NHS, already understaffed organisation will lose this amazing asset!
attributes.background: Revoke the new legislation regarding compulsory vaccination for all NHS workers from April 2022

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open which you might like to sign:

Do not make COVID vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872

Exempt NHS workers who have recovered from COVID from vaccination requirements
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603842

Do not make covid-19 or flu vaccine a condition of deployment for NHS workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598996

Do not make vaccination against Covid-19 mandatory
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602282
